summary: The National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration has 15 ships it uses for fisheries research, nautical charting, and other scientific missions. NOAA needs more mariners to support these ships. This Q&A report examines NOAA's recruitment and retention efforts amid a global mariner shortage. title: NOAA Mariner Recruitment and Retention: Actions Needed to Develop a Strategic Workforce Planning Process
